persName.forename: John Fortescue, 1st Baron Fortescue of Credan

note.p: Education: Inner Temple; Oxford; DCL (by diploma 1733)

Career: Called to the Bar (1712); KC (1714); Solicitor-General to the Prince of Wales (1714); Solicitor-General to the King (1715); MP for Midhurst (1715-1717); Reader to the Inner Temple (1716); Baron of the Exchequer (1717); Justice of the King's Bench (1718-1727); Justice of the Common Pleas (1729-1746)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Foster; GEC
